KA.AQWE.content: [program, minority, trap] the minority becomes almost natural
KA.AQWE.linkedContent: [program, minority, trap] the minority becomes almost natural

KA.IUHCI.content: man transmits enlightenment to next generation: push genus of man to level appropriate to purpose of nature > otherwise natural faculties would be largely pointless & vain [is this an argument?]
KA.IUHCI.linkedContent: man transmits enlightenment to next generation: push genus of man to level appropriate to purpose of nature > otherwise natural faculties would be largely pointless & vain [is this an argument?]

KA.IUHCI.content: transition, by way of continuous enlightenment, from a pathologically enforced co-ordination of society into a moral whole > raw natural faculty of moral discrimination becomes practical principles
KA.IUHCI.linkedContent: transition, by way of continuous enlightenment, from a pathologically enforced co-ordination of society into a moral whole > raw natural faculty of moral discrimination becomes practical principles

KA.EP.content: no objective conflict btwn morals & politics: only exists subjectively in selfish disposition of men > progress of culture allowing reason to execute ideas of natural law (but so also is guilt in such transgressions) > [but only theorists can say this?]
